meanings.definition: Aflatoxins: toxic substances produced by certain molds found in food and animal feed.
meanings.sent1: The aflatoxins in the moldy bread made people sick.
meanings.sent2: Farmers need to be careful to prevent aflatoxins from contaminating their crops.

meanings.sent1: Doctors warned about the dangers of aflatoxins in contaminated food.
meanings.sent2: Consumers should check food labels to avoid aflatoxins.

meanings.sent2: Aflatoxins can thrive in warm and humid conditions.
